' Can be used with any itemType ' ' ATTENTION must be called from all 3 of these Server Events of the itemType: ' onBeforeAdd And onAfterVersion And onAfterCopy ' ' if the itemType has these properties they will be reset ' ' approver_user_id (item) ' last_approval_date (date) ' 'MethodTemplateName=VBMain; Dim inn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim msg As String
'=============== Private Function fnResetDefinedItemProperties (ByRef updtItem As Item) As String
'## add properties to reset here updtItem.setProperty("last_approval_date","") updtItem.setProperty("approver_user_id","")
Return "OK" End Function
'=============== Function Main() As Item 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
Dim thisAction As String = Me.getAttribute("action","") Dim thisItemType As String = Me.GetType()
If (thisAction = "add") Then ' process - onBeforeAdd Event msg = fnResetDefinedItemProperties (Me)
Else ' process - onAfterVersion, onAfterCopy Event Dim newVerItem As Item = inn.newItem(thisItemType,"get")
Dim thisItemConfigId As String = Me.getProperty("config_id") Dim selProperties As String = "*"
' Retrieve the id of the New version of thisItem newVerItem.setAttribute("select",selProperties) newVerItem.setProperty("config_id",thisItemConfigId) newVerItem = newVerItem.apply() If(newVerItem.getItemCount() <> 1) Then Return inn.newError("New version not found") End If
Dim updtItem As Item = inn.newItem(thisItemType,"") updtItem.setID(newVerItem.getID())
'check lock Dim lockState As Integer = newVerItem.getLockStatus If lockState = 0 Then updtItem.setAction("edit") If lockState = 1 Then updtItem.setAction("update") If lockState < 0 Or lockState > 2= 1 Then Return Me ' maybe add an error here End If
msg = fnResetDefinedItemProperties (updtItem)
updtItem.setAttribute("serverEvents","0") updtItem.setAttribute("version","0") updtItem = updtItem.apply()
End If
Return Me End Function
